properties.address: Methodist Church, Newton Abbot, Devon TQ13 9AD
properties.description: Open to all. Free teas, coffees, snacks and delicious homemade soup with bread (donation pot is available). Bovey Food Hub is open 12pm to 1pm in the same space as well as the CAB.
properties.title: Bovey Warm Hub

properties.description: Open to all. Hot drinks and biscuits.
properties.title: Company & Coffee in Sidwell St Methodist Church

properties.description: Exwick Parish Hall is open to EVERYONE Friday mornings 10-12 term time. Come in for a cup of coffee and a friendly chat. There's a toddler area with plenty of toys, and outdoor Forest School most weeks. We also offer assistance if you're struggling with connecting online.
properties.title: Friday Friendship Coffee Morning

properties.address: Tedburn St Mary Village Hall, Tedburn st Mary, Exeter EX6 6DZ
properties.description: A monthly Friday lunch, open for drop-ins 12-2pm in the JB Room of the village hall. We cater for all ages. (Please note- not every Friday, we open once per month. Upcoming dates are 24th Nov, 15th Dec, more to be announced soon). Seasonal homemade main course and dessert, with a vegetarian option always available. Come and enjoy a sociable lunchtime and help reduce food waste too! We often finish with a game of cards for those who'd like to join in.
properties.title: Lunch Break Tedburn St Mary
